## ğŸ“‹ TERMS & CONDITIONS

### Revisions:
- **[2/3]** rounds of revisions included in the quoted price
- Additional revisions charged at â‚¹ [amount] per hour

### Client Responsibilities:
- Provide required content, images, and information on time

### Intellectual Property:
- Upon full payment, all rights transfer to client
- We retain the right to showcase in our portfolio (unless NDA)

### Cancellation & Refunds:
- Client can cancel with [7 days] notice
- Refund of unused portion after deducting completed work
- Termination fee: [10-20%] of total project value

### Warranty & Support:
- **[30/60]** days free bug-fix support after launch
- Extended support packages available separately

### Confidentiality:
- Both parties agree to maintain confidentiality
- NDA can be signed if required
